text: “I did it! I can be brave!” Rocco shouted, feeling a warm glow inside. He joined the fun and made new friends.
scene: Rocco laughing and playing games with the animals, his tail wagging happily as they dance around him.

character.name: Rocco
character.description: A small, gray rat with big, bright eyes and a fluffy tail. He is timid and loves cheese but is afraid to talk to other animals.

moral: Believe in yourself, and you can make wonderful friends!
